properties.query:
let threshold = 50;
let szSharePointFileOperation = "SharePointFileOperation";
let szOperations = dynamic(["FileDownloaded", "FileUploaded"]);
let starttime = 14d;
let endtime = 1h;
let historicalActivity =
    OfficeActivity
    | where TimeGenerated between(ago(starttime) .. ago(endtime))
    | where RecordType =~ szSharePointFileOperation
    | where Operation in~ (szOperations)
    | summarize historicalCount = count() by ClientIP, RecordType, Operation;
let recentActivity = OfficeActivity
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(endtime)
    | where RecordType =~ szSharePointFileOperation
    | where Operation in~ (szOperations)
    | summarize min(Start_Time), max(Start_Time), recentCount = count() by ClientIP, RecordType, Operation;
let RareIP = recentActivity
    | join kind= leftanti (historicalActivity) on ClientIP, RecordType, Operation
    // More than 50 downloads/uploads from a new IP
    | where recentCount > threshold;
OfficeActivity
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(endtime)
| where RecordType =~ szSharePointFileOperation
| where Operation in~ (szOperations)
| join kind= inner (RareIP) on ClientIP, RecordType, Operation
| where Start_Time between(min_Start_Time .. max_Start_Time)
| summarize StartTimeUtc = min(min_Start_Time), EndTimeUtc = max(max_Start_Time)
    by
    RecordType,
    Operation,
    UserType,
    UserId,
    ClientIP,
    OfficeWorkload,
    Site_Url,
    OfficeObjectId,
    UserAgent,
    TotalFiles = recentCount
| extend
    TimeGenerated = StartTimeUtc,
    UserAccount = UserId,
    IPCustomEntity = ClientIP,
    Site_URL = Site_Url
| summarize IPsList = make_list(IPCustomEntity)
    by
    TimeGenerated,
    UserAccount,
    Site_URL,
    RecordType,
    Operation,
    UserType,
    OfficeWorkload,
    UserAgent,
    StartTimeUtc,
    EndTimeUtc,
    TotalFiles
| extend IP = IPsList
| mv-expand IP
| distinct
    TimeGenerated,
    UserAccount,
    tostring(IP),
    TotalFiles,
    Site_URL,
    RecordType,
    Operation,
    UserType,
    OfficeWorkload,
    UserAgent,
    StartTimeUtc,
    EndTimeUtc
properties.displayName: SharePointFileOperation via previously unseen IPs V 2.0
properties.description:
Identifies when the volume of documents uploaded to or downloaded from Sharepoint by new IP addresses
exceeds a threshold (default is 50).
